summary: Frontend-only testing completed for MegaRadio auth UI screens (auth-options, login, signup, forgot-password). All screens render correctly with proper styling. Form validations and error toasts work. API integration with themegaradio.com mobile login endpoint tested and working (returns 401 for invalid credentials as expected).

ui_bugs.issue: Sign In and Create Account buttons don't navigate when clicked via Playwright automation - React Native Web TouchableOpacity press handlers may not trigger on DOM clicks in automated tests. Manual testing required to confirm.
ui_bugs.note: Navigation works via direct URL access and 'Continue without login' link navigates correctly, so this may be a Playwright + React Native Web compatibility issue only

issues: Minor typo: 'Enter you email we will send you verification mail.' should be 'Enter your email we will send you verification mail.'
Close button (X) in top-right corner not easily clickable in web via automation - may need accessibilityRole='button' for better web accessibility

action_items: Fix typo in /app/frontend/app/forgot-password.tsx line 115: Change 'Enter you email' to 'Enter your email'
Consider adding web-specific click handlers or using Pressable instead of TouchableOpacity for better web compatibility
Manually verify Sign In button navigation on Profile page works in real browser
critical_code_review_comments: All auth screens have proper data-testid attributes set
Form validations implemented correctly in login.tsx and signup.tsx
Error toast styling uses consistent pink/coral color scheme
authService.ts correctly uses themegaradio.com API base URL for mobile endpoints
authStore.ts implements proper secure storage with localStorage fallback for web
context_for_next_testing_agent: Auth UI screens implemented correctly per Figma designs. API integration works. TouchableOpacity click issues in Playwright are a known React Native Web limitation - manual browser testing recommended to confirm navigation works.

test_1_auth_options_screen_render.details: Auth-options page renders with MegaRadio logo, Login With Apple/Facebook/Google/Mail buttons, Continue without login link, and close button

test_2_login_screen_render.details: Login page renders with title, email/password inputs with icons, Login button, Forgot password link, and footer link

test_3_login_form_validation.details: Empty email shows 'Please enter your email'. Invalid email format shows 'Please enter a valid email address'. Wrong credentials shows 'Wrong email or password! Try again'

test_4_login_api_integration.details: API call to themegaradio.com/api/auth/mobile/login returns 401 with error message for invalid credentials - integration working

test_5_signup_screen_render.details: Signup page renders with name/email/password inputs, password hint text, and Signup button

test_6_signup_form_validation.details: Short password (less than 6 chars) shows error toast 'Password must be at least 6 characters'

test_7_forgot_password_screen_render.details: Forgot password page renders with title, subtitle (has typo), email input, Send button, and footer link

test_8_profile_guest_state.details: Profile page shows guest state with Welcome to MegaRadio title, Sign In button (pink), and Create Account button

test_9_continue_without_login_navigation.details: Clicking 'Continue without login' on auth-options navigates to home page ('/')

test_10_navigation_auth_options_to_login.details: Clicking 'Login With Mail' on auth-options navigates to /login
